tekst: It’s not a matter of how much the book costs. The thing is, how much does it cost you not to read it.
To remain indifferent to a book is to recklessly impoverish your life.
Knjiga je vrednija od svih spomenika ukrašenih slikama, reljefom i duborezom, jer ona sama gradi spomenike u srcu onog ko je čita.

Mostly through books we enjoy communicating with superior minds. In the best books, the authors address us, give us their most valuable thoughts and pour their souls into ours. Thank God for the books!
Books can be dangerous. At best, you should put a warning: 'It can change your life.'
Prema mom iskustvu, knjige imaju moć zaustaviti vreme, vratiti ga u prošlost ili poleteti u budućnost.
